quest.name: Oh Captain, My Captain
journal: Merilda may have stumbled upon a secret...

Fufulupa has accidentally overheard Merilda's tale regarding the bandits and their plans to obtain Nashachite stolen from Copperbell Mines. Before you can stop him, the Brass Blade runs to tell his supervising officer─who, unbeknownst to Fufulupa, is cooperating with the bandits. Find Captain Baldewyn before Fufulupa does!

You arrive too late to prevent Fufulupa from confronting his captain, and are forced to battle the corrupt officer and his bandit ally. Baldewyn remains defiant even after you defeat him, until the disgraced Captain Leofric reveals that Baldewyn was in fact operating without Lord Lolorito's knowledge and will therefore face severe punishment for his crimes. Return to Horizon and speak with Fufulupa when next you have an opportunity.

Due to the events at the Footfalls, Baldewyn has been stripped of his rank, leaving the Brass Blades of the Rose without a captain. For now, Fufulupa will serve as acting captain of the Horizon garrison. Though the young Lalafell believes this to be a temporary arrangement, he swears to do his utmost to protect the people of Horizon.
objectives: Defeat Captain Baldewyn and Baron von Quiveron IV!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”

dialogue.name: MERILDA
dialogue.text: You are an adventurer, are you not? I know this is sudden, but I have no one else to turn to.

dialogue.name: MERILDA
dialogue.text: Last night, a gang of bandits from the Quiveron Manse were in their cups, and I overheard them discussing their plans...

dialogue.name: MERILDA
dialogue.text: It seems they've come to collect gemstones stolen from Copperbell Mines. Nashachite, I think I heard one say. They are to meet with their co-conspirator soon, at the Footfalls─

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Wh-Wh-What did you say!?

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Illicit exchanges and shadowy dealings! The Brass Blades cannot abide such malfeasance!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Forgive my eavesdropping, Forename─I came to Crescent Cove merely to thank you in person.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: I never imagined I'd uncover a criminal conspiracy right outside Horizon's gates!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: We must act quickly if we are to apprehend these thieves! I will notify Captain Baldewyn at once!

dialogue.name: MERILDA
dialogue.text: No, wait! You mustn't! Oh, gods...

dialogue.name: MERILDA
dialogue.text: You must stop him before it's too late! Captain Baldewyn himself is working with the bandits!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Captain Baldewyn, sir! I've discovered something shocking, something horrible!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Someone has been stealing gemstones from Copperbell Mines and─

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Wait, those gauntlets, those boots─why, you're one of Quiveron's men! Sir, that man is a thief and a scoundrel!

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: ...And? What of it? His coin's good, and that's what counts.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: What!? Captain Baldewyn...are you working with these men!? It cannot be...

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: I told you to stay in Horizon, Fufulupa. It didn't have to be like this...

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: They'd get their Nashachite, I'd get my gil, and none would be the wiser.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: B-B-But, sir, what if your crimes are uncovered!? What if Lord Lolorito finds out!?

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: You godsdamned fool, don't you see!?

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: I am acting under the authority of Lord Lolorito himself!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: No... No! That can't be true...

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: Why do you think people join the Brass Blades, Fufulupa? To serve and protect? Hah!

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: We're not the bloody Flames here! We do this for the coin!

dialogue.name: ENEMY
dialogue.text: (-Ser Baron von Quiveron IV Esquire-)You there, adventurer! Do you remember me? Well, I remember you!

dialogue.name: ENEMY
dialogue.text: (-Ser Baron von Quiveron IV Esquire-)I am Ser Baron von Quiveron IV Esquire! You killed my brother, and now I'm going to return the favor!

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: Well, that settles it! It's clearly in everyone's best interests that both of you die!

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: That's enough, Baldewyn!

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Your partner is dead and your plans are undone. You've no reason left to fight.

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: Stay out of this, Leofric! I don't take orders from you!

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: I may have spared your life before, but if you interfere, I will not show you mercy!

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: And what mercy will he show you, I wonder? You who have done so much in another man's name.

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: What are you blathering on about!?

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Every fisherman in Crescent Cove knew about your meeting, you arrogant fool. Quiveron's men couldn't keep their mouths shut.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Imagine Lord Lolorito's surprise when he learned that a rank-and-file Brass Blade was using his name to advance a personal agenda...

dialogue.name: BALDEWYN
dialogue.text: He knows!? Seven hells! But I'm a captain, he wouldn't─

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: I was once a captain too, remember? And we both know what happened to me.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Well fought, boy. You've done the Brass Blades of the Rose proud.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Captain Leofric! Captain Baldewyn, he...he said that Lord Lolorito─

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Lord Lolorito wouldn't waste his time on a small-scale smuggling operation. This is all Baldewyn's doing.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: What else did he say? That all our brethren are no better, and that each and every one cares for naught but coin? Hah! Mere excuses to justify his schemes.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Aye, we've no shortage of greedy sods, some who'd probably sell their own mothers into slavery if the price was right.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: But there are men like you, Fufulupa─men good and true, whom the smallfolk respect.

dialogue.name: LEOFRIC
dialogue.text: Which is why I gave you the dagger. The Brass Blades of the Rose need a leader with honor, and you're the most honorable man I know.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: <sniffle> <sob> Captaaaaaain!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Thank you for all your help, Forename! The captain and I will escort Captain Baldewyn back to Horizon.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Pray visit me in town when next you return!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Welcome back, Forename! So much has happened!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Captain─ahem, Baldewyn has been arrested and stripped of rank, which means the Brass Blades of the Rose no longer have a captain.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Until a new one is designated, I've been ordered to serve as acting captain of the Horizon garrison.

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Though doubtless this is only a temporary arrangement, I will do my utmost to represent my brethren and protect the people of Horizon!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename, for your service to the sultanate. You are a true hero!

dialogue.name: FUFURUPA
dialogue.text: Captain... H-How could you...?

dialogue.name: BALDWIN
dialogue.text:
It's time to do your duty, Fufulupa!
Time to die for your country!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Why, Captain, why!? I trusted you!

dialogue.name: BALDWIN
dialogue.text: Heh, you're stronger than I thought!

dialogue.name: BALDWIN
dialogue.text: Damn you both, you're ruining everything!

dialogue.name: FUFULUPA
dialogue.text: Ware his spear, Forename!
